Staff.Update: UPDATE Location set LocationCode = @locationCode,LocationName = @locationName, LastUpdatedBy = 0, LastUpdatedDate = @lastUpdatedDate,ParentID = @parentID, TerritoryID = @territoryId WHERE LocationID = @locationId;
Staff.GetCombobox: SELECT * FROM {0} WHERE {1} like N'%@searchText%' ORDER BY {0}ID OFFSET (@page - 1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY;

Base.GetCombobox: SELECT * FROM {0} WHERE {1} like N'%{2}%' ORDER BY {0}ID OFFSET (@page - 1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY; SELECT Count(1) FROM {0} WHERE {1} like N'%{2}%'
Base.GetComboboxHasStatusColumn: SELECT * FROM {0} WHERE {1} like N'%{2}%' AND [Status] = 1  ORDER BY {0}ID OFFSET (@page - 1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY; SELECT Count(1) FROM {0} WHERE {1} like N'%{2}%'  AND [Status] = 1
Base.GetComboboxByField: SELECT * FROM {0} WHERE {1} = {2} ; SELECT COUNT(1) FROM {0} WHERE {1} = {2};
Base.GetComboboxByFieldHasStatusColumn: SELECT * FROM {0} WHERE {1} = {2} AND [Status] = 1; SELECT COUNT(1) FROM {0} WHERE {1} = {2} AND [Status] = 1;

TableField.List_TableField_Default: SELECT * FROM TableField WHERE LayoutCode = @LayoutCode AND UserID IS NULL ORDER BY SortOrder ASC
TableField.List_TableField_ByUserID: SELECT * FROM TableField WHERE LayoutCode = @LayoutCode AND UserID = @UserID ORDER BY SortOrder ASC
TableField.Update_TableField_First: UPDATE TableField SET SortOrder = @SortOrder,Hide = @Hide,Width = @Width WHERE LayoutCode = @LayoutCode AND Field = @Field AND UserID = @UserID;
TableField.Update_TableField: UPDATE TableField SET SortOrder = @SortOrder,Hide = @Hide,Width = @Width WHERE ID = @ID;

GroupBox.BulkUpdate_GroupBox: UPDATE GroupBox SET IsUse = @IsUse,SortOrder = @SortOrder WHERE ID = @ID;
GroupBox.BulkUpdate_GroupBoxField: UPDATE GroupBoxField SET IsUse = @IsUse,ColumnNumber = @ColumnNumber,GroupBoxID = @GroupBoxID,SortOrder = @SortOrder WHERE ID = @ID;

UserConfig.DeleteMany: DELETE FROM UserConfig WHERE UserConfigID IN @recordIDs
UserConfig.FindById: select uc.UserConfigID, uc.StaffID, uc.UserID, uc.WorkflowID, s.StaffCode, s.FullName as StaffFullName, wf.WorkflowCode, wf.WorkflowName from UserConfig uc left join Staff s on uc.StaffID = s.StaffID left join Workflow wf on uc.WorkflowID = wf.WorkflowID WHERE uc.UserConfigID = @UserConfigID;
UserConfig.CheckDuplicate: SELECT Top 1 UserConfigID FROM Bank WHERE {0}
UserConfig.GetComboboxStaff: select StaffID, (FullName + ' (' + StaffCode + ')') as StaffFullName from Staff where FullName like N'%{0}%' or StaffCode like N'%{0}%' order by StaffCode OFFSET ({1} - 1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY; select count(1) from Staff where FullName like N'%{0}%' or StaffCode like N'%{0}%';
UserConfig.GetComboboxUser: select UserId, (FullName + ' (' + UserName + ')') as UserFullName from Users where (UserName like N'%{0}%' or FullName like N'%{1}%') and (Status!=-1) order by UserName OFFSET ({1} - 1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY; select count(1) from Users where (UserName like N'%{0}%' or FullName like N'%{0}%') and (Status!=-1);
UserConfig.GetComboboxWorkflow: select WorkflowID, WorkflowName from Workflow where (WorkflowCode like N'%{0}%' or WorkflowName like N'%{0}%') and (Status = 1) order by WorkflowCode OFFSET ({1} - 1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY; select count(1) from Workflow where (WorkflowCode like N'%{0}%' or WorkflowName like N'%{0}%') and (Status = 1);
